capabilities.name: yapi_get_project
capabilities.description: Get YAPI project information including name, description, project_id and base path.

capabilities.name: yapi_get_interface_list
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of all API interfaces from YAPI project.

capabilities.name: yapi_get_interface
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific API interface by ID from YAPI.

capabilities.name: yapi_get_category_list
capabilities.description: Get a list of all API categories/folders from YAPI project.

capabilities.name: yapi_get_category_interfaces
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of API interfaces within a specific category from YAPI.

capabilities.name: yapi_add_category
capabilities.description: Create a new API category/folder in the YAPI project.

capabilities.name: yapi_get_interface_menu_list
capabilities.description: Get the hierarchical menu structure of interfaces and categories from YAPI.

capabilities.name: yapi_add_interface
capabilities.description: Add a new interface under a specific category.

capabilities.name: yapi_update_interface
capabilities.description: Update an existing interface by ID.
